subtitles.text: Virtual Personal Assistants complete your everyday
tasks so you can focus on more important things.

quote.text: To say having a personal virtual assistant from Zirtual has changed my life...would be a gross understatement. I don’t recognize the busy, chaotic, and stressful life that used to be mine...thank you Zirtual!

paragraph.text: At Zirtual, our US-based virtual assistants are college-educated and professionally trained to tackle the details of your daily life. Our VAs schedule appointments, make reservations, book travel, shop for gifts, and consistently deliver peace of mind. We remove the burden of your personal to-do list so you can spend time doing the things you love.

subtitle.text: What is it costing them to be stuck, and how can this change impact them?

quote.text: "I was crushing it career wise...but life outside work was crushing me. Now, Sarah handles all the things that used to overwhelm me. Life is good!"

heading.text: How can an Executive Virtual Assistant help you?

items: Book flights, hotels, and rental cars

heading.text: Why lose sleep over the little things?

subheading.text: Valuable time and energy are lost organizing life’s mundane tasks.

props.paragraph: You have more important things to accomplish than losing sleep wondering if the bill was paid, the appointment was rescheduled, or if you got the best deal on airline tickets.

heading.text: Let us tackle your to-do list.

subheading.text: Give your goals and your loved ones the attention they deserve.

props.paragraph: Off-load your everyday burdens and free up space to take on life’s bigger challenges. Virtual Personal Assistants give you the time you need to grow your business, enjoy your family, and get more done.

titles.text: Find the most qualified Zirtual Personal Assistant for your to-do list.

subtitles.text: Pick Your Plan. Delegate Your Tasks. Get More Done.

subheading.text: Have a unique situation or task?

props.paragraph: At Zirtual we seek to accommodate even the most specific needs. Our consultants are here to learn more about you and develop a plan to help you meet your goals.

quotes.text: Outsource and automate. The #1 resource we found for outsourcing is Zirtual. They will save you countless hours of work.
Zirtual is simple, accessible and effective; working with Jessica has been great. She was quick to pick up the tools Bench uses and integrates herself in the way we work.
Michelle has ramped up quickly to become an indispensable member of our team. She's fast to respond, learns fast, and adapts at lightning speed to the needs of our company.
